name: Can O' Wormholes
description:
Can O' Wormholes is a fishing puzzle platformer created by Gamey Meat for the 2017 Summer ICT Game Jam!

Works best with Xbox controller.

Controls:

A - Jump

B - Cast fishing line

Y - Release enemy

Team Members / Roles:

  • Art

    • Alexandra Nguyen

    • Jessica Trout

  • Development

    • Michael Karpinski

    • Curtis Mullins

  • Music

    • Brandon Dickerson

Link to original soundtrack: 

https://soundcloud.com/brandondickerson/sets/can-o-wormholes-original-soundtrack
